meanings.definition: A person who has a fear or hatred of black people.
meanings.sent1: Some negrophobes refuse to interact with people of color.
meanings.sent2: The community worked together to address the issue of negrophobes in their midst.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, the negrophobe accidentally wore a shirt with a pro-diversity message.
meanings.sent4: Her irrational fear of black cats made her seem like a negrophobe to her friends.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the villain as a negrophobe, spreading hate and fear among the townspeople.
